original_text: And the mind of the king of Syria was greatly troubled because of this thing, and he called his servants and said to them, “Will you not show me who of us is for the king of Israel?”
korean_text: 이러므로 아람 왕의 마음이 불안하여 그 신복들을 불러 이르되 우리 중에 누가 이스라엘 왕과 내통하는 것을 내게 말하지 아니하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: And the mind of the king of Syria was greatly troubled
who of us is for the king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 중에 누가 이스라엘 왕을 편든 사람인지
